content.html: [quote comment="2326"]On the same topic (OpenID, JanRain, etc), you mentioned they have published and RC for 2.0, was that on the PHP Library? I looked and only saw Python. I would not mind using the RC, to report bugs, etc.[/quote] They've published an RC for both Python and PHP. I believe there are a few API changes, so the PHP one likely won't work with this plugin yet, but I haven't tested it.
